alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duval County through 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Fort Caroline, or 7 miles north of Unf, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach and Mayport. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jacksonville.
